<mxGraphModel>
  <root>

      <mxGeometry x="410" y="10" width="120" height="120" as="geometry">
        <mxRectangle width="120" height="40" as="alternateBounds"/>
      </mxGeometry>
    </mxCell>
    <mxCell id="2" style="port;image=/editors/images/ethernet.png;align=right;imageAlign=right;spacingRight=18" parent="ftp_server" vertex="1" type="Interface" name="ftp_server">
